## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G43940](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G43940)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ADH2, ATGSNOR1, GSNOR, HOT5, PAR2</u>
- **Gene Name:** ALCOHOL DEHYDROGENASE 2, S-NITROSOGLUTATHIONE REDUCTASE, sensitive to hot temperatures 5, PARAQUAT RESISTANT 2
- **Description:**   GroES-like zinc-binding dehydrogenase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
